titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4680) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a voluntary program for prescription drug coverage under the Medicare Program, to modernize the Medicare Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-705, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4680 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 248.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 539.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 204 (Roll no. 347).
Mr. Moakley moved to reconsider the vote on ordering the previous question.
Mr. Dreier moved to table the motion to reconsider.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 205 (Roll no. 348).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 213 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: Mr. Goss moved to reconsider the vote on agreeing to the resolution.
Mr. Dreier moved to table the motion to reconsider.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 204 (Roll no. 350).

bill.summary: 6/27/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4680 (voluntary prescription drug coverage under the Medicare program).
